name: Survive In Strange World
description:
A magical power called The Spark reappears with you in this world. The Spark protects human survival, but it is also coveted by various evil forces. Can you survive under their overwhelming attacks?

Equip yourself with powerful weapons and mechs, build your own shelter, accommodate refugees and partners, build turrets and city walls. Hone your combat skills, or rely on the power of partners to resist evil together, Protect the spark.

Welcome to the strange world. In the end, you will face your ultimate fate. No matter what happened in the past, you want to live in the future.

Game features:

  • A comprehensive beginner's tutorial
  • Randomly generate and combine over 20 types of enemies. Deal with enemies flexibly with different skills and attributes.
  • More than 60 different weapons, mechs, and enhancements, choose the combat style that suits you.
  • You can play game as bullet shooting, action games, or tower defense games according to your own preferences. Survival is justice.
  • Build the base and balance development and survival. Keep your food and sanity abundant.
  • You can rely on the power of your partners or fight alone (although this can be extremely difficult)
